Articles.Content:
This is my first craft posted here.

I got tired of making complicated ships, so decided to make simple ones which do same job.

Here is my newest creation.

It can escape Kerbin atmosphere with just TurboJet Engine and has plenty of fuel for orbital maneuvers. I haven't tested, but I think it should be able to land and go back to orbit without refueling, so it might be useful for Kerbin exploration.

Action Groups:

5 - Toggles TurboJet Engine

6 - Toggles Rockomax 24-7

Sparrow Mk I
